 Transform a CellIndex.

Detailed Description

Class CellGeometry manages the mapping between the AMR index space and the cell-centered geometry index space. It is a subclass of hier::BoxGeometry and it computes intersections between cell- centered box geometries for communication operations.

See header file for CellData<DIM> class for a more detailed description of the data layout.

See also:
hier::BoxGeometry

pdat::CellOverlap
